<result>## ULTRAWORK PHASE 3: PROJECT-BASED UI COMPONENTS - COMPLETE ✅

✅ **Project Grouping** - Sessions automatically grouped by `workingDirectory`

✅ **Preserved Functionality** - Favorites, terminal view, close session, status indicators all working
✅ **Edge Cases** - Empty state handling, "Other" project for ungrouped sessions
✅ **React State Management** - Proper re-renders on collapse toggle using local state
